entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Friday 03 March 2023
